member.name: T:SoftFloat32
member.summary: Describes an IEEE-754 single precision floating point number implemented in software.

member.name: P:SoftFloat32.Data
member.summary: Gets the raw data describing the IEEE-754 single-precision number.

member.name: M:SoftFloat32.Static_Singleton.Add(SoftFloat32,SoftFloat32)
member.summary: Calculates the sum of two IEEE-754 single precision numbers.
